Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; MUSIC 84 and MUSIC 421 are to be taking twice to earn 2 credits for each course; Students will repeat JAZZ 100, a 1-credit course, for a total of 2 credits
